name: historyAPI
description: Get comprehensive transaction history data from the 1inch History API. Supports 4 different endpoints for retrieving transaction events, filtered events, search events, and swap events.

endpoint.description: The specific endpoint to call. get-events: Get basic transaction events, post-events: Get filtered transaction events, search-events: Search transaction events with complex filters, swap-events: Get swap-specific transaction events

address.description: Account address to get transaction history for

limit.description: Amount of events to return, default is 100, max is 2048

tokenAddress.description: Token address used at event (for get-events endpoint)

chainId.description: Chain ID for the transaction. 1=Ethereum, 45=Arbitrum, 137=Polygon, 10=Optimism, 56=BNB Chain, 42161=Arbitrum, 43114=Avalanche, 100=Gnosis, 250=Fantom, 1313161554=Aurora, 8217=Klaytn, 324=zkSync Era, 8453=Base, 59144=Linea, 501=Calypso, 146=Arbitrum Nova, 130=Metis

toTimestampMs.description: To time at milliseconds (for get-events endpoint)

fromTimestampMs.description: From time at milliseconds (for get-events endpoint)

chain_ids.description: Array of chain IDs to filter by

transaction_types.description: Array of transaction types to filter by

token_addresses.description: Array of token addresses to filter by

chain_based_token_addresses.description: Array of chain-based token addresses to filter by

searchFilter.description: Complex search filter object for search-events endpoint

swapFilter.description: Swap filter object for swap-events endpoint

chain_ids.description: Array of chain IDs to filter by
